bibl.title: New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World.

series.title: Texts and Editions for New Testament Study.

bibl.note: Pp. 1-11: Th.J.Kr. and T.N., The World of New Testament Manuscripts: 'Every Manuscript Tells a Story'; - 339-346: Indexes.
bibl.seg: KRAUS Thomas J. and Tobias NICKLAS (Edd.), New Testament Manuscripts. Their Texts and Their World. (Texts and Editions for New Testament Study. 2.)
Leiden - Boston, Brill, 2006, 8°, xii-346 pp., 8 figg. ISBN 90-04-14945-7. €129.
Pp. 1-11: Th.J.Kr. and T.N., The World of New Testament Manuscripts: 'Every Manuscript Tells a Story'; - 339-346: Indexes.

C.R. par John Granger Cook, TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 12 (2007) < http://rosetta.reltech.org/TC/vol12/KlausNicklas-eds2007rev.pdf >. - J.K. Elliott, NT 49 (2007) pp. 205-206. - David C. Parker, BASP 43 (2006) pp. 175-177. - Ulrich Schmid, JThS N.S., 59 (2008) pp. 254-256.
